idea-plugin.name: Serial Port Monitor
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin allows you to communicate with external devices over a serial connection in the Serial Connections tool window.
Features:
  • Multiple simultaneous serial port connections
  • Fully customizable parameters with profiles
  • Regular and Hex view
  • Timestamps for every received line
  • Ability to save output to a file
  • Manual hardware flow control


Initial release by Dmitry Cherkas
